table.name: jo_vtpdfmaker
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `jo_vtpdfmaker`( `vtpdfmakerid` int(11) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `module` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `description` text DEFAULT NULL, `body` longblob DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `settings` text DEFAULT NULL, `header` longblob, `footer` longblob, PRIMARY KEY (`vtpdfmakerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

table.name: jo_vtpdfmaker_seq
